name: Alex Johnson
title: Software Developer
summary: Detail-oriented Software Developer experienced in Full-stack technologies. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a focus on delivering high-quality code. Previously worked at TechSolve, contributing to key projects and product releases.

professional_experience.title: Full-stack Developer
responsibilities: Worked closely with cross-functional teams to implement new features for the main web application.
Optimized backend API, reducing latency by 20% and improving system scalability.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines that improved deployment frequency by 30%.
Contributed to migrating the monolithic application to microservices, reducing system complexity.

professional_experience.title: Junior Software Developer
responsibilities: Automated manual testing processes, reducing QA time by 15%.
Participated in code reviews, maintaining high-quality code standards.
Implemented user analytics using Google Analytics, improving UX/UI decisions.

details: Focused on Algorithms and Data Structures.
Participated in Hackathons, securing 2nd place in the University Hackathon.
Completed courses in Web Development, Cybersecurity, and Machine Learning.
